page.title: 16HISTORY OF THE THREE SISTERS
page.content: The three sisters is a recreational area , but at one time it was a large area of coal spoil.The spoil was created by the three shafts of Garswood Hall Colliery .Three spoil heaps were created, hence the name of "The Three Sisters".Each spoil heap was over 150feet high and contained millions of tons of coal spoil. Since 1970 work has been going on to transform this eyesore into an amenity area.The large spoil heaps have been flattened so that today , it provides an arena of some 15 acres,and includes a lake and a large area of farmland.Its varied uses also includes an area devoted to industry.
